body: Hi Mostapha, Thanks, the simulations are now running smooth! One more question that just popped after taking a look to the 'glazingCreator' component, is if there is a way to assign 'EPConstructions' or 'RADMaterials' to the generated windows, and/or what are the defaults? Cheers, Alejandro [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Y8bD62HksPgZfVIIYA1W00mqeRcICokZXLqDgI5ogN7Rp3udJ2*5cbSF1Zj6pBcCXHV4ZenvSFVtiVjS4NIUQVgtgYVVFsU6/glzingCreator_EPConsRADMat.png)
